page.title: 02LAND OWNERS IN THE BLOCK
page.content:
The land in this block falls into three groups.The major owners;those owning sizeable pieces of mainly farming land and those holding small parcels of land in the block.
"=Staffordshire County Council #=Forestry Commission %=Estate of Major Richard Hazard &=Lord Lichfield's Estate >=Small land owners
% % % " " & & & % % > " " & & # > > > " " " " # > > " " " " # # > > " " " " # # > > " " " " # # The small owners are:Mrs C.Henderson Mr Ricketts,Mr Simmons,Mr Mayer,Mr Rees Mr Gibson,Mrs Nixon and Mr White. (RB Berkswich)
